project_descr: Institutional and technical support to the justice sector to facilitate provision of equitable access to justice, and promote the law and order through accountable and transparent formal and informal institutions.

outputs.output_descr: Increased capacity of Ministry of Justice (MoJ) to deliver prosecutorial services at State and County level – with nominal legal aid access for vulnerable groups.
donor_name: UNITED NATIONS DEVELOPMENT FUND FOR WOME
DEPARTMENT OF FOREIGN AFFAIRS AND INTERNATIONAL TRADE (DFAIT) GOVERMENT OF CANADA

outputs.output_descr: Majority of the rank and file of South Sudan Police Service are ex-combatants from SPLA who have been transferred into the Police.  The project aimed at establishing Police Service in South Sudan with a professional civilian orientation by using a multi-disciplinary approach and by supporting the process of putting in place legal regulatory frameworks to facilitate the transition from military to civilian modes of policing. Main areas of activities are Institutional/ organizational capacity development; Supporting infrastructure development; and supporting the designing of relevant strategic p
donor_name: UNITED NATIONS DEVELOPMENT FUND FOR WOME

outputs.output_descr: Improved coordination and institutionalization of justice sector services and access to remedies delivered through mandated rule of law institutions and other service providers
donor_name: UNITED NATIONS DEVELOPMENT FUND FOR WOME
GOVERNMENT OF UNITED STATES OF AMERICA
DEPARTMENT OF FOREIGN AFFAIRS AND INTERNATIONAL TRADE (DFAIT) GOVERMENT OF CANADA

outputs.output_descr: The Judiciary of South Sudan (JoSS) has increased capacity to process and manage cases
Reduction in arbitrarily and unlawfully detainees and decreased violations of juvenile rights.

project_title: 4.3. support to access to justice and rule of law
